definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

pinyin: Dong1 fang1 Ming2 zhu1 Dian4 shi4 Ta3

sentences.english: The tower is designed to put the antenna at a maximum height on the spire.
sentences.chinese: 電視塔的天線設計在塔尖的最高處。

sentences.english: The tower’s basement is to undergo reconstruction to make the tower capable of transmitting digitally.
sentences.chinese: 爲了使電視塔能夠發射數字信號，地下室將接受改造。

sentences.english: The pearl TV tower looks like something out of a comic book.
sentences.chinese: 東方明珠電視塔看上去就像一本漫畫書中的形象。

sentences.english: By the way, can you tell me how tall that TV tower is?
sentences.chinese: 順便問一下，你能告訴我那座電視塔有多高？

sentences.english: The shining television tower beaconed through the evening.
sentences.chinese: 燈光通明的電視塔整晚似燈塔般照耀着。

sentences.english: Other structures named in the notice include the Huabei hotel and a television tower.
sentences.chinese: 政府通知中還提到了華北酒店和電視塔。

sentences.english: The new TV tower and the second oldest church in Berlin.
sentences.chinese: 柏林的新電視塔和第二老的教堂。

sentences.english: Generally, they monitor the smooth functionability of the entire tower.
sentences.chinese: 總之，他們監控者整座電視塔的平穩運轉。

sentences.english: The slanting rays of the sun aureoled the television tower.
sentences.chinese: 斜射的陽光以光輪環抱電視塔。

sentences.english: The television tower domineers the city.
sentences.chinese: 這座電視塔鳥瞰着全城。

sentences.english: Traber drove his car on the wires at a height of 53 meters.
sentences.chinese: 鋼絲固定在電視塔上，距離地面53米高。

sentences.english: The Almaty Television Tower was built between 1975 to 1983.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉木圖電視塔始建於1975年，1983年完工。

sentences.english: There are few people, he says, who know as much about television towers as he does.
sentences.chinese: 他說，對這座電視塔，幾乎沒人能比他知道的更多了。

definition: Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
Great stone bridge or Dashiqiao county level city in Yingkou 營口|营口, Liaoning
abbr. for 搭鐵接線|搭铁接线/chassis grounding (i.e. using the chassis as ground, to serve as a return path for current in an electric circuit)
Xinshi District of Ürümqi, Xinjiang/Sinshih District of Tainan, Taiwan
to go sightseeing/to spend one's leisure time wandering around
Jin Mao Tower, skyscraper in Shanghai
Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

definition: Chihkan Tower (formerly Fort Provintia) in Tainan, Taiwan (also written 赤嵌樓|赤嵌楼[Chi4 kan3 lou2])
Yekaterinburg (Russian city, also known as Ekaterinburg or Sverdlovsk)
